extendedInfo.description: UPDATED FOR 2013!!!With March Bracket Helper PRO you get 2 things in 1.  You get all of the records of the seed vs. seed match-ups AND you get the opportunity to have your picks made for you using all the data.  Take all the guess work out of your bracket and let the past predict the future with March Bracket Helper PRO.  Every time you click you can get a different result.
